00011 void GenRandomRotations()
00012 {
00013         for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++)
00014         {
00015                 randRot[i] = rand() % (360 - 15 + 1) + 15;
00016         }
00017 }

00019 void GameWorld::Init(Player* player, std::multimap<std::string, IGameAsset*> gameAssets)
00020 {
00021         // Sets this game contexts assets to the  loaded game assets from the control engine
00022         SetGameAssets(gameAssets);
00023 
00024         // Each new entity, asset needs its own shader (terrain or anything with multiple meshes especially)
00025         ShaderSource mainShader = ParseShaders("res/shaders/Default.shader");
00026         ShaderSource terrainShader = ParseShaders("res/shaders/Terrain.shader");
00027 
00028         // Prepare player
00029         m_player = player;
00030         m_player->SetCamera(m_camera);
00031         m_glRenderer.Prepare(m_player->GetModel(), mainShader.VertexSource, mainShader.FragmentSource);
00032 
00033         // Pass player info to camera
00034         m_camera->ParsePlayerInfo(m_player->GetPosition(), m_player->GetRotation());
00035         float horizontalDistance = m_camera->CalculateHorizontalDistance();
00036         float verticalDistance = m_camera->CalculateVerticalDistance();
00037         m_camera->CalculateCameraPosition(horizontalDistance, verticalDistance);
00038 
00039         // Prepare terrains
00040         for each (Bruteforce* terrain in m_terrains)
00041         {
00042                 terrain->SetCamera(m_camera);
00043                 m_glRenderer.Prepare(terrain->GetModel(), terrainShader.VertexSource, terrainShader.FragmentSource);
00044         }
00045         
00046         // Prepare assets
00047         std::multimap<std::string, IGameAsset*>::iterator itr;
00048         for (itr = m_gameAssets.begin(); itr != m_gameAssets.end(); itr++)
00049         {
00050                 itr->second->SetCamera(m_camera);
00051                 m_glRenderer.Prepare(itr->second->GetModel(), mainShader.VertexSource, mainShader.FragmentSource);
00052         
00053                 if (itr->first == "md2")
00054                 {
00055                         itr->second->SetCamera(m_camera);
00056                         m_glRenderer.Prepare(itr->second->GetModel(), mainShader.VertexSource, mainShader.FragmentSource);
00057                 }
00058         }
00059 
00060         GenRandomRotations();
00061 
00062         // AI testing
00063         /*ComputerAI p;
00064         for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++)
00065                 p.Update();
00066         getchar();*/
00067 
00068         // Animation testing
00069         //md2file = new DynamicObject(2.5, 512, 512, 0, 100);
00070         //md2file->Import("res/objects/knight.md2", glm::mat4());
00071 }

00073 void GameWorld::Update()
00074 {
00075         // Camera
00076         m_camera->ParsePlayerInfo(m_player->GetPosition(), m_player->GetRotation());
00077         float horizontalDistance = m_camera->CalculateHorizontalDistance();
00078         float verticalDistance = m_camera->CalculateVerticalDistance();
00079         m_camera->CalculateCameraPosition(horizontalDistance, verticalDistance);
00080 
00081         //glm::vec3 test = m_player->GetPosition();
00082         //std::cout << test.x << " " << test.y << " " << test.z << std::endl;
00083 
00084         // Blue sky
00085         glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.5, 1.0);
00086 
00087         // Render terrain
00088         for each (Bruteforce* terrain in m_terrains)
00089         {
00090                 m_glRenderer.Render(terrain->GetModel());
00091         }
00092 
00093         // Render player
00094         m_glRenderer.Render(m_player->GetModel());
00095 
00096         // Update all physics body locations *** All asset rendering is done through here for now because I dont want to have to call asset render twice ***
00097         UpdatePhysics();
00098 
00099         // Animation
00100         //double now = glfwGetTime();
00101         //md2file->Animate(now - lastTime);
00102         //lastTime = now;
00103 
00104         //md2file->UpdateVAO();
00105 
00106         //md2file->Draw();
00107 }

00109 void GameWorld::Destroy()
00110 {
00111         std::multimap<std::string, IGameAsset*>::iterator itr;
00112         for (itr = m_gameAssets.begin(); itr != m_gameAssets.end(); itr++)
00113         {
00114                 itr->second->Destroy();
00115         }
00116 
00117         // Delete all heightmap BruteForce
00118         for (int i = 0; i < m_terrains.size()-1; i++)
00119                 delete m_terrains[i];
00120 }

00124         m_physicsWorld = physicsEngine;
